title: Skier Mikaela Shiffrin Gets Quizzed On Downhill Cheese Races
teaser: We invite the Olympic medal-wedding skier to play a game called "It's the cheese! After it!" â€” three questions on the Gloucestershire Cheese Rolling Races. Originally broadcast July 11, 2014.
